articles.title: Alphabet (GOOGL) Boosts Google Photos With Pop-Up UI Update
articles.content: Alphabet's (GOOGL) Google enhances Google Photos with a pop-up UI, allowing users to share photos and videos directly from the photo-sharing app's library.

articles.title: Meta Platforms' (META) New AI Model Can Translate 200 Languages
articles.content: Meta Platforms (META) has created a new AI model called No Language Left Behind (NLLB 200), which can translate 200 different languages. This can help the company in building the metaverse.
